eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiIsImtpZCI6IjI4YTMxOGY3 LTAwMDAtYTFlYi03ZmExLTJjNzQzM2M2Y2NhNSJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBlcmNlbGwiLCJhdWQiOi JzdXBlcmNlbGw6Z2FtZWFwaSIsImp0aSI6IjllOTE2ZjhmLTcyMTUtNGJjMC04ODJiLWQ4MGRlY WQzYmZlOSIsImlhdCI6MTYwMDU3MTg4OSwic3ViIjoiZGV2ZWxvcGVyL2VjZDA3MzhhLTI4M2Ut NTNlNS0xZWVhLTU0ODE0YmY3YWFjOSIsInNjb3BlcyI6WyJicmF3bHN0YXJzIl0sImxpbWl0cyI 6W3sidGllciI6ImRldmVsb3Blci9zaWx2ZXIiLCJ0eXBlIjoidGhyb3R0bGluZyJ9LHsiY2lkcn MiOlsiNzIuMTM0LjE5OS4xMzgiXSwidHlwZSI6ImNsaWVudCJ9XX0.1mOkoNtbw_R3QNGE_LWzB MplrGOuof4e4e14ccYWEvWdlZPHlOkmMFvT1wS5nkUJO6t6elgTZ4YdbqMe6YZOJw
Shelly\'s spread-fire shotgun blasts the other team with buckshot. Her Super destroys cover and keeps her opponents at a distance!
8-BIT lumbers along like an arcade cabinet on legs. He shoots Blaster Beams and his Super boosts friendlies\' damage!
Colt fires an accurate burst of bullets from his dual revolvers. His Super shreds cover and extends the bullet barrage!
Bull deals massive damage up close with his shotgun. For his Super move, he charges through barriers and knocks back enemies!
Nita strikes her enemies with a thunderous shockwave. Her Super summons a massive bear to fight by her side!
Dynamike lobs two explosive sticks of dynamite. His Super attack is a whole barrel full of dynamite that blows up cover!
Bo fires three explosive arrows toward his targets. His Super ability places a trio of hidden, explosive mines on the ground!
Emz attacks with blasts of hair spray that deal damage over time, and slows down opponents with her Super.
Jessie\'s Shock Rifle shoots energy orbs that bounce between enemies. Her Super deploys a cute but deadly gun turret!
Brock fires a long-range, explosive rocket at enemies. His Super is a ballistic rocket barrage that destroys cover!
This boxing botanist will plant her feet and go toe to toe! Her Super gives her tough, vegan protective gear.
El Primo throws a flurry of punches at his enemies. His Super is a leaping elbow drop that deals damage to all caught underneath!
Poco fires damaging sound waves at enemies. His Super can heal both Poco himself and his teammates!
Barley attacks by lobbing bottles at enemies, doing splash damage. His Super is a huge barrage of burning bottles!
Jacky works her Jackhammer to shake up the ground and nearby enemies. Her Super pulls in nearby foes, leaving them in the dust!
Jacky works her Jackhammer to shake up the ground and nearby enemies. Her Super pulls in nearby foes, leaving them in the dust!
Rico fires a burst of bullets that bounce off walls. His Super burst is a long barrage of bouncy bullets that pierce targets!
Carl throws his Pickaxe like a boomerang. His Super is a crazy cart spin that clobbers anyone around him.
Penny shoots bags of coins, damaging the target and anyone standing behind. Her Super is a mortar-style cannon turret!
Piper\'s sniper shots do more damage the farther they travel. Her Super drops grenades at her feet, while Piper herself leaps away!
Batter up! Bibi\'s got a sweet swing that can knock back enemies when her Home Run bar is charged. Her Super is a bouncing ball of gum that deals damage.
Bea loves bugs and hugs. She shoots her mechanical drones at range, and her Super sends forth an angry army of swarming bees!
Nani loves her friends and looks over them with a watchful lens. She handles threats with angled shots, and her Super allows Nani to commandeer her pal Peep, who goes out with a bang!
Frank swings his hammer at enemies, sending a shockwave. His Super is an especially powerful blow that stuns enemies!
Pam shoots from the hip, peppering targets with shrapnel. Her Super is a healing turret that restores her and teammates\' health!
Max goes fast! Her attack is a fast-firing blaster. Her Super speeds up her and allies!
Mortis dashes forward with each swing of his shovel. As his Super attack, he sends a cloud of bats to damage enemies and heal himself!
Sprout was built to plant life, launching bouncy Seed Bombs with reckless love. Its Super creates a plant-based obstacle!
Gene uses his magic lamp to shoot a splitting projectile. His super is a magical hand that grabs and pulls enemies close!
Tick is a metal ball of barely controlled excitement and energy - explosive energy! He throws mines, and his Super makes his head detach, seek a target and explode.
Tara\'s triple tarot card attack pierces through enemies. Her Super is a black hole that sucks in all nearby enemies, causing damage!
Mr. P is a disgruntled luggage handler who angrily hurls suitcases at opponents. His Super calls robo-porters to help him.
Amber has always been a firebug. She loves to light up the world and any opponents that come at her!
Leon shoots a quick salvo of blades at his target. His Super trick is a smoke bomb that makes him invisible for a little while!
Crow fires a trio of poisoned daggers. As a Super move he leaps, firing daggers both on jump and on landing!
Spike throws cactus grenades that send needles flying, and a show-stopping Super: a field of cactus spines that slows down and damages enemies!
Sandy is a sleep-deprived Brawler with powerful control over sand: casting sharp pebbles at enemies, and summoning a sandstorm to hide teammates.
Colette is going to get you! She taxes opponents\' health and has fancy moves to boot.

He\'s a Protector with a penchant for parties. Surge attacks foes with energy drink blasts that split in 2 on contact. His Super upgrades his stats in 3 stages and comes complete with totally awesome Body mods!
Gale is a tireless handyman who gets no rest. With his blower, he blasts foes with a wide shot of wind and snow, while his Super pushes them back with a forceful blizzard!
Shelly\'s Super shells slow down enemies for 3.0 seconds!
When Shelly falls below 40% health, she instantly heals for 1800 health. Band-Aid recharges in 20.0 seconds.
Nita recovers 500 health whenever her bear hits an enemy. When Nita deals damage, her bear regains 500 health.
Nita\'s bear attacks faster. Time between swipes is reduced by 60%.
Colt\'s movement speed is increased by 10%.
Coltâ€™s main attack range and bullet speed are increased by 11%.
When Bull falls below 40% health, his reload speed doubles!
When Bull falls below 40% health, he gains a shield that reduces all damage taken by 30%.
Jessie can repair her gun turret for 800 of its missing health by zapping it with her attack.
Scrappy the Turret now shoots energy orbs that bounce between enemies. The orbs\' range after a bounce is 51% of normal range.
The impact of Brock\'s attack sets the ground on fire. Enemies in the area take 600 damage per second! Lasts for 2 seconds.
Brock loads a fourth rocket into his launcher, increasing his ammo capacity (and discarding the thermos bottle he\'s been keeping in his launcher\'s #4 rube).
Dynamike can ride the blast wave of his explosives to jump over obstacles!
Adds +1000 damage to Mikeâ€™s Super.
Bo spots enemies hidden in bushes from 150% longer distance than normally.
Instead of a knockback, Boâ€™s traps now stun the enemy for 2.0 seconds.
When Tick takes no damage and doesn\'t attack, he starts recovering health 2.0 seconds faster than normal.
Tick\'s reload time is 10% shorter.
Increases the Damage Booster\'s range by 50%.
When 8-Bit is near his Damage Booster, he will plug in and have increased movement speed.
Enemies that stay within the cloud of Emz\'s toxic hair spray suffer increasing damage, 20% per hit.
Emz recovers 300 health per second for each enemy inside her Super\'s area of effect.
Enemies caught in El Primo\'s Super will burn for 1200 damage over 4 seconds.
El Primo gains 25% speed boost for 4.0 seconds after using Super.
Barley regains 400 health from each attack.
Adds +140 damage per second to Barleyâ€™s attack.
When Poco\'s attack hits friendly Brawlers they now heal for 700 health.
Pocoâ€™s Super now also hits enemies, dealing 800 damage.
Rosa recovers 200 health per second when inside a bush.
Rosaâ€™s punches gain +220 damage during her Super.
Rico\'s bullets, from attack and Super alike, get supercharged by their first bounce and deal +100 damage!
When Rico falls below 40% health, he runs 34% faster.
Darryl\'s Super reinforces his barrel, reducing all damage he takes by 30% for 0.9 seconds.
When Darryl uses his Super, he doubles his reload speed for 5.0 seconds.
When Penny\'s Cannon is destroyed, it shoots out one last barrage of 4 bombs targeting nearby enemies, each dealing 1680 damage.
Cannonballs from Pennyâ€™s turret set the ground on fire for 3 seconds. Enemies in the burning area take 400 damage per second.
Carl throws his Pickaxe with 13% more speed, allowing it to travel faster and return faster.
During Carl\'s Super, all damage he receives is reduced by 30%.
When receiving damage, Jacky returns the favor by converting 15% of the damage into a Groundbreaker counterattack.
Jacky\'s Hard Hat protects her by reducing any damage she takes by 15%.
Piper\'s attack deals +800 extra damage (at max range) when she\'s hidden in a bush.
When Piper hits an enemy with her attack, she reloads 0.3 ammo instantly.
Whenever Pam hits enemies with Scrapstorm, she heals herself and nearby friendly Brawlers for 40 health.
Healing turret now also damages enemies for 500 damage per second.
Frank steals the power of a Brawler he defeats, increasing his damage by 50% for 12 seconds!
Frank gains +1100 health.
Bibi\'s movement speed is increased by 12% when her Home Run bar is fully charged.
When Bibiâ€™s Homerun bar is fully charged, she shields herself from all damage by 30%.
Instantly supercharge Bea\'s Big Sting one time if she misses a supercharged shot.
Bea escapes certain defeat with 1 health, and gains a momentary shield once per match.
Peep deals up to 2500 extra damage based on his travel distance.
Nani takes 80% less damage while her Super is active.
Mortis reaps the life essence of Brawler he defeats, restoring 1800 of his health.
Mortis gains a Dash Bar! His dash range is increased by 75% when the bar is fully charged. It takes 3.5 seconds for the bar to charge when Mortis has all three dashes ready.
Tara\'s Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Tara appears and attacks her enemies.
Taraâ€™s Super cracks open a dimensional portal! A shadowy version of Taraâ€™s appears to heal Tara and her teammates.
Gene heals all friendly Brawlers around him for 400 health per second.
When Gene\'s Super is fully charged he does +300 damage with his attack.
Max now charges her Super while moving.
Max reloads faster while moving.
Mr.P\'s overstuffed suitcases bounce and burst even if they don\'t hit a target or obstacle.
The robo-porters respawn 3 seconds faster after being defeated.
Seed Bombs that don\'t make contact with enemies will explode with a larger explosion radius.
Sprout activates a shield, partially protecting itself from all attacks while inside a bush.
After using Super, Spike regenerates 800 health per second by staying in its area of effect.
Spikes from cactus grenade fly in a curving motion, making it easier to hit targets.
Crow\'s poison saps the strength of enemies, who deal 20% less damage while poisoned.
Crow deals +120 damage with his attack and Super to targets with 50% or less health.
When Leon uses his Super, he gains 24% boost to his movement speed for the duration of his invisibility.
Leon recovers 1000 health per second while his Super is active.
Sandstorm now also damages enemies for 120 damage per second.
Sandstorm now also heals friendly Brawlers for 250 health per second.
Amber can have two fuel puddles on the ground simultaneously and she will recharge her Super automatically when standing near one.
Gale\'s Super now stuns enemies that are pushed against obstacles from his Super.
Gale\'s snow balls now also slow down opponents for 0.3 seconds.
Surge\'s main attack now splits when hitting walls or when reaching max distance.
Surge keeps his STAGE 1 Super upgrade for the full match duration.
All enemy brawlers hit by Colette\'s charge are carried to the farthest point of the attack!
Colette\'s super gives her a 10% shield for 5.0 seconds. Every enemy brawler hit by it will add 10% more protection.
Shelly dashes ahead, skipping a few unnecessary steps!
On activation, Shelly\'s next main attack focuses the fire to a smaller area and increases the range.
Nita commands her bear to slam the ground, stunning all enemies within its reach.
Colt instantly reloads 2 ammo.
Bull instantly rejuvenates himself for 1500 health.
Bull can interrupt his Super charge and slow all nearby opponents with a massive stomp for 1.5 seconds.
Jessie triggers a shockwave from her turret, slowing down all enemies within its area of effect.
Scrappy\'s attack speed is doubled for 5.0 seconds.
Brock blasts the ground below him and propels himself into the air. The explosion deals 500 damage to nearby enemies.
Dynamike spins furiously and throws multiple sticks of dynamite around himself. Each dynamite deals 700 damage to enemies.
Once activated, the next main attack also stuns enemies for 1.5 seconds.
Bo drops a totem that recharges his and any allies\' Supers within the area of effect.
Bo triggers all of his mines instantly.
Tick makes a quick dash, leaving a single mine on the ground.
8-Bit instantly teleports to his Damage Booster.
EMZ pushes back all enemies around her while also dealing 500 damage.
El Primo grabs the closest enemy within his reach and flips them like a pancake over his broad shoulders.
El Primo summons a small meteor to strike the nearest enemy. It deals 2000 damage and destroys walls.
Barley drops a sticky concoction that leaves a puddle, slowing down all enemies that make contact with it.
Barley throws a healing potion at nearby allies that creates an area that heals for 500 health per second.
Poco and all nearby allies heal 500 health per second for 5.0 seconds.
Rosa fertilizes the ground around her and bushes instantly grow to provide great cover.
Rico blasts waves of bouncy bullets in all directions.
Darryl spins around and sprays a barrage of shots in all directions. Each shot deals 400 damage and recharges his Super by 25% if it hits enemies!
Penny blows up her cannon! The explosion destroys walls and deals 1500 damage to nearby enemies.
Penny calls an artillery strike from her Cannon to her current location.
Carl drops a trail of hot rocks behind his cart! The rocks deal 300 damage per second to enemies who step on them.
Jacky gets a burst of energy and moves 20% faster for 3.0 seconds.
Piper pops a defensive shot at the closest enemy, dealing 100 damage, while also pushing them back and slowing them down.
On activation, Piper\'s next main attack will home in on enemies.
Pam triggers her turret to emit a pulse that heals allies inside the turret\'s range, including herself, for 1200 health.
Frank clears any disabling effect on himself, and momentarily becomes immune to stuns, slows and knockbacks.
Bibi heals 600 health per second for 4.0 seconds.
Bea drops a beehive with a splash of sticky honey around it. The honey slows down enemies that step in it.
Nani detonates Peep and teleports herself to his last location.
Mortis spins his shovel, hitting all enemies around himself for 1300 damage.
Mortis reloads faster for 4.0 seconds.
Tara and her allies are able to see all enemies, even inside bushes, for 5.0 seconds.
All enemies close to Gene are instantly pushed back. Gene also restores 700 health.
Max dashes forward, and becomes immune to all damage from enemies while dashing.
Max blinks back to a place of her choosing after 4.0 seconds\' delay, recovering any damage she received in the meantime.
Mr. P buffs his current porter by increasing its damage by 150 and health by 1000.
Sprout consumes a bush to restore 2000 health.
Spike shoots 3 waves of needles in all directions, dealing 520 damage per hit.
Crow gets a shield for 60% of incoming damage for 3.0 seconds.
All currently poisoned enemies are slowed for 2.5 seconds.
Leon creates an illusion of himself to confuse his enemies.
Sandy falls a sleep for 2.0 seconds and his health is fully restored.
Amber runs fast for 3.0 seconds while spilling her fire fluid, which she can then ignite.
Gale drops a bounce pad underfoot, launching friend and foe alike into the air.
Surge overloads his circuits and teleports a short distance forward.
Colette\'s next shot deals 40% of her current health as damage.

BrawlWiki is your open source to all the content available in Brawl Stars to provide you with a fun experience to get a better understanding of your personal stats, past/present game modes, and all brawlers currently available in the game, and top rankings of players/clubs across the globe! \n\nThe app will be updated at a steady pace to provide you with the best stats/information and new content.

string-array.item: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
